Text: Thanks!!! Just so you know, the Dutch version of Goblet of Fire only contains the first 17 chapters, I think. Could you PLEASE try and post the whole book? I'm blind and I've been looking for digital Dutch copies everywhere to read them on my braille display. Thanks very much for the books, but it would be great if you posted the complete Dutch GOF.
THANKS!!!!!!!!!!!!! How do you get to all these Dutch versions?
MAN, I APPRECIATE THIS TORRENT AND YOUR HARD WORK!!!!! CAN YOU SEED THIS, PLEASE????? REALLY NEED THAT STUFF BUT THE SPEED IS BELOW 0
